mapper.select: SELECT re_no, re_category, re_parent_no, re_mem_id, re_content, re_ip, b.mem_name AS re_mem_name, TO_CHAR(re_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS re_reg_date, TO_CHAR(re_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS re_mod_date FROM reply a, member b WHERE re_category=#{reCategory} AND re_parent_no=#{reParentNo} AND a.re_mem_id = b.mem_id ORDER BY re_no desc
